title: Vaccine induced damage to our vascular system
cleaned_text: Josef Thoma MD/PhD, general practitioner from Berlin, lucidly explains the findings of vaccine-induced vasculitis and thrombosis made by pathologists Burkhardt and Lange. He discusses the clinical consequences and does not shy away from addressing the political context and historical parallels.

opengraph.title: Vaccine induced damage to our vascular system
opengraph.description: The residues of vaccine-induced spike proteins in the organs and blood vessels cause the inflammation of our blood vessels (Vasculitis).
